import ComponentLayout from '@/layouts/component.layout'
import { IconLib, Li, List } from '@fold-ui/core'
import React from 'react'

export const docs = {
    title: 'List',
    subtitle: 'The List component is utilized for depicting an HTML list element and its corresponding LI element.',
    description:
        'Lists are useful for creating menus and organizing information. Typically, list items are presented with bullet points in unordered lists, while in ordered lists, they are typically depicted with an ascending counter on the left, such as numbers or letters.',
}

```tsx
import { Li, List } from "@fold-ui/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => (<List as="ul" type="circle">
        <Li>Milk</Li>
        <Li>Eggs</Li>
        <Li>Flour</Li>
        <Li>Water</Li>
        <Li>Salt</Li>
        <Li>Cocoa</Li>
    </List>);

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => (
    <List
        as="ul"
        type="circle">
        <Li>Milk</Li>
        <Li>Eggs</Li>
        <Li>Flour</Li>
        <Li>Water</Li>
        <Li>Salt</Li>
        <Li>Cocoa</Li>
    </List>
)
```
### Custom Bullet

export const CustomBullet = () => (<List type="none">
        <Li row width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle"/>
            Milk
        </Li>
        <Li row width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle"/>
            Eggs
        </Li>
        <Li row width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle"/>
            Flour
        </Li>
        <Li row width="fit-content" colorToken="danger">
            <IconLib icon="circle"/>
            Water
        </Li>
        <Li row width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle"/>
            Salt
        </Li>
        <Li row width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle"/>
            Cocoa
        </Li>
    </List>);

<div className="story-block">
<CustomBullet />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="CustomBullet.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const CustomBullet = () => (
    <List type="none">
        <Li
            row
            width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle" />
            Milk
        </Li>
        <Li
            row
            width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle" />
            Eggs
        </Li>
        <Li
            row
            width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle" />
            Flour
        </Li>
        <Li
            row
            width="fit-content"
            colorToken="danger">
            <IconLib icon="circle" />
            Water
        </Li>
        <Li
            row
            width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle" />
            Salt
        </Li>
        <Li
            row
            width="fit-content">
            <IconLib icon="circle" />
            Cocoa
        </Li>
    </List>
)
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
